name: Wedding Doll - Dress Up & Fashion Games
name_original: Wedding Doll - Dress Up & Fashion Games
description:
Get Ready to Dress & Make up the Most Amazing, Beautiful and Princess Wedding Dolls and Share them with your friends to amaze them and they would love to create another beautiful Wedding Doll For you too So Enjoy you Wedding Doll With friends.

You have got a huge accessories collection for your Wedding Dresses Glasses, Hats, Caps, Shirts, Shoes, Santa Caps, Awesome Hairs, Shorts and very much!!

Great Features of game:
1. Easy to play.
2. Great, Awesome and fun sounds.
3.Amazing accessories.
4. Sharing with friends.

Download and Play today, Enjoy!

Please rate & review to get us better and creating Amazing games for you,

Thanks
